answers.answer: Hello,A complete evaluation is important for correct diagnosis and treatment. Peeing a lot can be due to a UTI or conditions like diabetes mellitus.It is suggested to consult your doctor. The most important laboratory test is a urine analysis. It may be possible that you may need antibiotics depending on the culture sensitivity report. I sincerely hope that helps. Keep me posted.Best luck and regards!

question: I need help i am peeing a whole alot and its can wake me up all hours of the night to go to the loo. i have came on my period however didnt last as long as normal and all pregnancy test are neg. i am in no pain and i dont understand what it is. please help
title: Peeing alot and i had my period
